meanings.definition: Of very poor quality or condition.
meanings.sent1: The poxiest toy in the box was missing an arm.
meanings.sent2: The poxiest shirt I own is faded and torn.
meanings.sent3: The poxiest sandwich I've ever had was so stale, it crumbled in my hands.
meanings.sent4: Her poxiest excuse for being late was that her alarm clock didn't go off.
meanings.sent5: The poxiest car on the lot had rusted doors and a cracked windshield.

meanings.sent1: The poxiest patient in the hospital needed isolation to prevent spreading the illness.
meanings.sent2: The poxiest outbreak in history led to widespread panic.
meanings.sent3: The poxiest petri dish in the lab looked like a tiny battlefield of germs.
